data.title: Concert in the Park
data.meta_description: Our Concert in the Park is held annually in August at Murrysville Community Park. Thank you to ALL of our wonderful SPONSORS who make it possible, our BANDS who sound amazing, and especially our GUESTS who spend their evening with us and make it so much FUN! Click to see this year's date, bands, food vendors and sponsors!
data.text:
Our 2024 Performers

Lineup:

5:15-6:00: RML Jazz

6:30-7:15: The Licks

8:00-dark: Saddle Up Band

RML Jazz 5:15-6:00 p.m.

RML Jazz mixes Smooth Jazz with Bebop and Classic Jazz as well as a helping of Modern Jazz, Dixieland

The Licks 6:30-7:15 p.m.

We are a fun, Pittsburgh-area cover band performing your favorite hits from the 60s-now!

Saddle Up Band 8:00 p.m.-dark

Saddle Up…this band’s name cannot be any more descriptive in the style of music it represents.

It all began with front man and lead singer Mike Garris, and his quest to find the perfect combination of professional musicians for the band. Mike’s passion, dedication and determination to find the best of the best lead him to drummer Jim Spillar, rhythm guitarist Gary Hill, lead guitarist Jay Pheifer, bassiest Bob Lunieski, and Jay Casper on keys.

These 5 individuals create a unique style of country with rock-like edge. Music lovers from both country and rock n’ roll genres enjoy and appreciate the sounds of Saddle Up.

The Concert in the Park wouldn't be possible without the financial support of our amazing community businesses!

If you'd like to be involved as a sponsor of this event, please contact the Recreation Department at 724-327-2100 x115 or email cgreene@murrysville.com

Check out our Sponsor Opportunities below and please contact us to learn more about how you can be involved.

We look forward to working with you!

Interested in Performing or Vending?

Bands that are interested in performing for future events should complete an information form here: Band Info Form.

If you are a food vendor that is interested in being considered for Concert in the Park please fill out an information form here. If you would like to learn more about the event itself please contact Amy Wengrzyn at 724-327-2100 ext. 131 or email.
